# GitHub Actions Workspace Setup

This workspace is dedicated to managing and creating GitHub Actions workflows.

## Project Overview

A comprehensive GitHub Actions workflow repository containing:
- Example CI/CD workflows
- Reusable workflow templates
- Best practices and documentation
- Sample configurations for common use cases

## Key Files

- `.github/workflows/` - Contains all workflow definitions
- `README.md` - Project documentation and workflow guide
- `.github/templates/` - Reusable workflow templates
